chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has the above problem:
I will return the iPhone because it does not match the stated condition. There is a dent on the bottom left corner, which can still be seen clearly from 50cm away. I would like to exchange it for another device.
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards, 
AS
